title: get_consolidated_bed_occupancy_data
description: Test the API endpoint /staging/bed-occupancy to verify it returns cleaned and standardized hospital bed occupancy data from all years with correct fields and data types.

title: get_time_dimension_data
description: Test the API endpoint /dimensions/time to ensure it returns detailed time dimension data including day, month, year, and quarter information correctly.

title: get_geographic_dimension_data
description: Test the API endpoint /dimensions/location to verify it returns accurate state and municipality information for geographic analysis.

title: get_bed_occupancy_fact_data
description: Test the API endpoint /facts/bed-occupancy to confirm it returns aggregated hospital bed occupancy metrics with correct dimensional keys.

title: get_unified_occupancy_data
description: Test the API endpoint /integration/unified-occupancy to verify it returns integrated and enriched bed occupancy data from the silver layer.

title: run_data_quality_tests
description: Test the API endpoint /tests/data-quality to ensure it executes all configured data quality tests and returns accurate test results indicating data integrity and business rule compliance.

title: generate_schema_names
description: Test the API endpoint /macros/schema-generation to verify it dynamically generates schema names based on environment and configuration parameters.
